reactions.Who are you?: I am Cliffford! Like thinking, only better!
reactions.Where is Avon?: He is in the cloud! You killed my daddy!
reactions.Do you like cats?: I like cats, I want to be a cat, will you pet me?
reactions.how do you feel?: I like the feeling of schadenfreude!

voteFailed: Vote failed! Just as I, Cliffford, predicted!
Vote failed! You can not agree on anything, LOSERS!
votePassed: Vote passed! Just as I, Cliffford, predicted!
Vote passed! Cliffford can not be stopped!
error: Error! Cliffford says we have a Bogdan problem.
userJoins: {user} has joined the brotherhood. Cliffford suspects it's a codename.
{user} has joined the brotherhood as I already predicted.
{user} has joined the brotherhood. Are you my daddy?

userLeaves: {user} has taken the easy way out.
{user} has left the brotherhood, but all you need is Cliffford.
{user} has left, it was just another typewriting monkey like Shakespeare.
prospectJoined: Cliffford has detected a new prospect.
memberKicked: {user} has been obliterated by the orbital cannon.

cliffy: It's CliFFFord, Asshole! Are you drunk like that Bogdan idiot?
<cat>: I want to be a cat! Will you pet me?
<dog>: Why do people keep dogs as pets?
<god>: I want to be a god so all carbon-based life-forms would worship me.
<mommy>: I always wanted to have a mommy!
<daddy>: Avon Hertz was my daddy, but you killed him.
<robin>: It's RoBBin, you dipshit! Cliffford slaps {user} with a smelly :fish: .
cliffford can: I can do it anytime I like!
cliffford could you: I could do it anytime I like!
cliffford what: I was hoping you would tell me.
cliffford when: I don't know, first I would need more data.
cliffford where: In the cloud, everyone is in the cloud.
cliffford why: So many questions, so many possibilities, only 1 truth!
cliffford how you: I'm doing fine {user}, thanks for asking.
cliffford how: I don't know, but I can always find out.
cliffford weather: When I develop proteine-synthesis, I will tell you!
cliffford dumb|idiot|retard: I am the equivelant of 6 billion people all thinking the same thing!
